entry.title: [Pre-BIP] Community Consensus Voting System
entry.summary: In a discussion on the bitcoin-dev mailing list, Chris Priest expressed his belief that once the blocksize debate is resolved, there will be no more contentious changes to deal with in the voting system. However, another participant named Staf pointed out that there are other contentious issues in the technology world, such as DRM. The conversation did not delve further into these topics.
